"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"This is a VR mission where your objective
is to reach the final area.
You will primarily be fighting in the
Armada Battlesphere, where you will
encounter simulated obstacles that
represent events in ARKS' recent history.
Make the most of each of your abilities
to break through these obstacles.
―――――――――――――――――――
Defeat the enemy waiting in the final area"

"The special training is about
to begin! Your objective is to
pacify two battle zones, then
proceed to the final area and
defeat the powerful enemy
that you encounter there."

"First, divide into two groups and
take the teleporters in front of
you to reach the battle zones,
and clear out the enemies in both!"

"Sending forces of equal strength
each way will be key to clearing this
quickly! Now, let the training begin!"

"From here, you will be transferred to
the final area. Destroy the enemies
on the allied ship, then board the
enemy ships and clear them out."

"If you can destroy the enemy
turrets, we'll send in allied
support weapons to replace
them. That should help turn
the tide in your favour!"

"This training is simulating a total
war situation, so you'll be facing
difficult enemies all the way
through. Do your best out there!"
